dict.string: I’m really sorry about this, but I can’t take any requests right now. Please try again in a little while.
There’s something wrong, and I can’t answer your questions right now. Please try again in a little while.
Sorry, I’m not able to help you right now. Please try me again in a little while.
Something’s amiss… can you check back with me in a little while?
Siri is adding new users every day. You will receive an alert when you can start using Siri.
You can start using Siri soon.
Sorry, could you say that again?
